collect_repo_files() loads all Python files into memory simultaneously, which could cause memory issues for large repositories
No file size validation before reading files, potentially loading very large files
Exception handling in collect_repo_files() is too broad and silently ignores all errors
Multiple file system operations without batching or async processing
No early termination or filtering options for large directory traversals
verdicts.summary: The code has good overall structure and reasonable performance for typical use cases, but lacks safeguards for large repositories. The main concern is memory usage when processing many or large files simultaneously. The recursive file collection and synchronous file reading could be optimized for better scalability.
